Images.Caption_en: Magnetic North Pole expedition. Kari Vainio (second row, second person from left) acts as the support team leader, others will ski.

Text_en: The expedition group got together to TF hut for risk management discussions. During the weekend, some difficult cases were handled pertaining to exceptional situations. Another target was to ease the possible tensions caused by hectic preparation phase. Some of the support team members participated the meeting during Saturday.
